title: Could a bespoke duvet give you a better night's sleep and prevent nocturnal disagreements?
text:
Are you a hot person or a cold person? I’m not talking about your personality type, I’m talking about your body. Personally, I’m a cold person, always have been. I reliably feel a chill in my bones when temperatures drop below 25C, and between October and April cannot function without gloves.

All of which is manageable – until bedtime. Because my husband is constitutionally other to me, instantly overheating the moment the tog level of the duvet climbs beyond three. He is also organisationally other to me, meaning I am more likely to buy our bedclothes than him, so for years he has suffered beneath the weight of bedding designed for Arctic climes. It’s hard to know whether this has affected his...
